gift_wrap_is_not_available: Please Note: This item cannot be gift wrapped.
usps_ship_ok_msg: Cannot be shipped to a P.O. Box, APO/FPO or U.S. Territory
most_items_we_ship_returnable_statement: There is always FREE SHIPPING on orders of $99 or more ($45 or more with Hudson''s Bay Credit) or beauty orders of $49 or more ($29 or more with Hudson''s Bay Credit). If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may return the item(s) free of charge to any Hudson''s Bay store for an exchange or refund.
